member.name: T:DiagnosticApiDemo.Controllers.WeatherForecast2Controller
member.summary: 请求方式1： weatherforecast?api-version=2.0 请求方式2: [Route("{v:apiVersion}/weatherforecast")] 2.0/weatherforecast 请求方式3: o.ApiVersionReader = new HeaderApiVersionReader("x-api-version"); request.header("x-api-version","2.0")
